domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
Just now I asked the President if he was kidding when he said he told his people to slow down testing, which is how White House officials explained the comment. 

He said, “I don’t kid.”

He also said again testing is a double-edged sword, and praised the job the U.S. has done.
